blocks.Title: Contact Us

blocks.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

blocks.title: Book a Consultation
blocks.description: Schedule a free 30-minute consultation with one of our licensed immigration consultants.

blocks.question: How long does the consultation take?
blocks.answer: Our initial consultation typically takes 30-45 minutes.

blocks.question: Do you charge for the initial consultation?
blocks.answer: No, we offer a free initial consultation to assess your profile and discuss your immigration options.

blocks.question: What documents should I prepare for the consultation?
blocks.answer: Please bring passports, educational credentials, work letters, language tests, and any previous applications.

blocks.question: How quickly can you respond to my inquiry?
blocks.answer: We typically respond within 24 hours on business days. For urgent matters, please call us.

blocks.question: Do you provide services in languages other than English?
blocks.answer: Yes, we can consult in French, Spanish, Mandarin, and Hindi.
